newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore rubber market closed for holidays.
newsitem.headline: Singapore rubber market closed for holidays.

text.p: The Singapore rubber futures market was closed on Wednesday for the New Year holidays and on Thursday for general elections here. The market will reopen on Friday.
At the close of the market on Tuesday, March RSS3 settled unchanged at 127.00 U.S. cents a kg. April/June RSS1 settled slightly higher at 184.00 Singapore cents (US$1.31) a kg from 183.50 cents.
January TSR20 settled unchanged at 169.75 Singapore cents (US$1.21) a kg.
